name: Chameleon
description:
This flower features dark teals, purples and a hint of green.  The flower comes with a clear jeweled center and it attached to a clip allowing for many uses.  

%% Free shipping in July to the USA!!

name: Red Posey Headband
description:
My red posey flower on a thin elastic headband. The flower is beautiful and deep. Very luxurious feel to the petals. Perfect for girls of any age, from newborn to hot momma!

Add me on face book http://www.facebook.com/pages/Coras-Corner/111713738855770?v=wall

Thanks to Angie Arthur Photography for the great live model shots.  Visit her blog http://www.thearthurclan.com/

name: Waste Not want 3 piece Set
description:
This 3 piece set is the debut piece for my waste not want line.  I got fed up with throwing out jeans or adorable baby things thanks to a rip that was unrepairable.  So i got out the stockpile and finally got creative.  Fabric flowers like these solved the problem.  
This set include one denim clip, one khaki piece in tan color with a large metallic brad and one soft blue cotton piece with one medium sized blue colored pearl type of  brad.  The finishing touches can be change as requested.  
The second photo shows all three pieces.  
Thank you to Angie Arthur Photography for the great model shots.  Check out her blog at http://www.thearthurclan.com/.  

For more offerings in the Wast Not Want Not line please visit http://www.facebook.com/album.php?aid=36030&id=111713738855770

Add me on facebook for special offers http://www.facebook.com/pages/Coras-Corner/111713738855770

name: Black and White on a thin headband
description:
This is a part of my waste not want not line.  It is a smaller black and white fabric flower attached directly to a thin black headband and accented with 3 small pearl style jewels.  I can make about 15 of this exact look.  

Available in a variety of sizes.  

Thank you to Angie Arthur Photography for the great pictures.   http://www.thearthurclan.com/

Fore more wast not want not offerings please visit http://www.facebook.com/album.php?aid=36030&id=111713738855770

name: Brass Magnolia
description:
This cream toned flower is accented with a large metallic toned brad. It comes on a ribbon lined hair clip, but can be attached to a button if that if preferred. JUst message to seller at checkout. 
The clip measures about 5 inches across. 
A perfect fall look. 

Thank you to Angie Arthur Photography for the model shot. Her work can be seen at http://www.thearthurclan.com/
